name: FreeCare
description:
A trivia game that is created for the sole purpose of educating the public about mental health problems while generating ads revenue. All profits will go to Komunitas Peduli Skizofrenia Indonesia (KPSI), to help for consultation, medications, therapies, etc.
Feel free to check their website: https://skizofrenia.org/donasi/

It is still under development, but rest assured, updates will come in near future!
